title: Sql query disclosure,
vulnerability_information:
Hi,

path:- https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/query?status=accepted&status=assigned&status=merge_ready&status=needs_information&status=needs_review&status=needs_revision&status=new&status=reopened&component=- Select a component&group=component&col=id&col=summary&col=component&col=status&col=type&col=priority&col=milestone&col=severity&col=time&col=points&col=reporter&col=keywords&desc=1&order=id&report=66

I have found that "In the report parameter, i can read out what the SQL query website uses to reveal out the information from the database which is really not good for your website, Now On your website attacker may be use heavy  tools for finding other vulnerability like SQL injection by injection the malicious query in your web application, which can cause web application slow down.

Kindly hide this error.

Thank you
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi,

path:- https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/query?status=accepted&status=assigned&status=merge_ready&status=needs_information&status=needs_review&status=needs_revision&status=new&status=reopened&component=- Select a component&group=component&col=id&col=summary&col=component&col=status&col=type&col=priority&col=milestone&col=severity&col=time&col=points&col=reporter&col=keywords&desc=1&order=id&report=66

I have found that "In the report parameter, i can read out what the SQL query website uses to reveal out the information from the database which is really not good for your website, Now On your website attacker may be use heavy tools for finding other vulnerability like SQL injection by injection the malicious query in your web application, which can cause web application slow down.

Kindly hide this error.

Thank you

activities.message:
Hm, I am having trouble following your steps to reproduce this problem. Could you be  more epxlicit? It might be that the HackerOne URL-highlighting is mangling things for me, not sure...

That said, this bug bounty program is not for website/bug tracker/infrastructure things we run but solely for Tor (the network daemon) and Tor Browser. But thanks for reporting this bug, though. (Let's figure out whether it's a real one we should fix anyway)
activities.markdown_message:
Hm, I am having trouble following your steps to reproduce this problem. Could you be more epxlicit? It might be that the HackerOne URL-highlighting is mangling things for me, not sure...

That said, this bug bounty program is not for website/bug tracker/infrastructure things we run but solely for Tor (the network daemon) and Tor Browser. But thanks for reporting this bug, though. (Let's figure out whether it's a real one we should fix anyway)

activities.message: I was meant that i can read thAT query through which web application reveal out the report from the database, i.e. SELECT title, description FROM report WHERE id='66', i can read out through breaking the query by '  )  ". Now a potential attacker can use heavy tools to exploit the vulnerability which can definitly cause your web server slow down.

activities.message:
Hey Janu,

trac is open source software. You can also read the source code to see the kind of SQL queries it executes.

Leaking the SQL query format is ugly, I agree but I don't think this is an actual problem.
activities.markdown_message:
Hey Janu,

trac is open source software. You can also read the source code to see the kind of SQL queries it executes.

Leaking the SQL query format is ugly, I agree but I don't think this is an actual problem.

activities.message: Closing as informative. Keep on checking the SQL machine!
